title: when does poro rider sejuani become availabe?
body: hello fellow summoners! when does poro rider Sejuani become available again ?

replies.body: Since she's a winter skin, she'll likely return when the Snowdown comes around again, like Purodyuusaa said. :]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uGvYpyvA,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-10T18:48:24.148+0000)
>
> Since she's a winter skin, she'll likely return when the Snowdown comes around again, like Purodyuusaa said. :]

This thread is outdated, but it's the first one that comes up on search; snowdown has come and she isn't up yet ;-; it it still possible she'll come?
She should now be in the shop! Legacy Snowdown skins will be available until January 7th at 23:59 PST.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=uGvYpyvA,comment-id=000200010000,timestamp=2015-12-10T18:21:19.036+0000)
>
> She should now be in the shop! Legacy Snowdown skins will be available until January 7th at 23:59 PST.

Hurray<3 I bought her immediately, thanks so much! Now I'll leave this thread alone, haha.
Sometime near December during the Snowdown Showdown event.
